name: Mental Health & Parenting Support
description: Homeless Prenatal Program provides individual psychotherapy to clients, as well as parenting classes, fatherhood services and children’s playgroups. Our mental health and parenting programs help clients address the varied challenges of parenthood. They help parents manage stress, overcome barriers, build resiliency, achieve goals and create community. All services are client-centered and trauma-informed and seek to provide cognitive, emotional and social support for families. Services include: -
